# Raspberry Pi 5 WiFi Firmware
# Download from official Raspberry Pi firmware repository
# https://github.com/raspberrypi/firmware

# Files needed:
# - brcmfmac43455-sdio.bin - WiFi firmware binary
# - brcmfmac43455-sdio.clm_blob - Regulatory data
# - brcmfmac43455-sdio.txt - NVRAM configuration

# Bluetooth firmware:
# - BCM4345C0.hcd - Bluetooth firmware

# Download and place these files in this directory
